accelerometer_publisher.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 from robotic_skin.sensor.lsm6ds3 import LSM6DS3_IMU
2 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
3 import rospy
4 import os
5 import rospkg
6 import argparse
7 
8 if __name__ == "__main__":
9  """
10  code for publishing real accelerometer data in ROS.
11  """
12  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
13  parser.add_argument('--config_file', action="store",
14  dest="config_file", required=True,
15  help="The configuration yaml file name in package's config folder")
16  args = parser.parse_args()
17  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
18 
19  config_file = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'config', args.config_file)
20  accel_gyro = LSM6DS3_IMU(config_file)
21  imu_number = str(accel_gyro.config_dict['imu_number'])
22 
23  rospy.init_node('talker_{imu_number}'.format(imu_number=imu_number), anonymous=True)
24  pub = rospy.Publisher('/imu_data{imu_number}'.format(imu_number=imu_number), Imu, queue_size=10)
25  r = rospy.Rate(100)
26 
27  imu_msg = Imu()
28  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
29  accel_gyro_list = accel_gyro.read()
30  imu_msg.header.frame_id = imu_number
31  imu_msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
32  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.x = accel_gyro_list[0]
33  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.y = accel_gyro_list[1]
34  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.z = accel_gyro_list[2]
35  imu_msg.angular_velocity.x = accel_gyro_list[3]
36  imu_msg.angular_velocity.y = accel_gyro_list[4]
37  imu_msg.angular_velocity.z = accel_gyro_list[5]
38  pub.publish(imu_msg)
39  r.sleep()
